fieldValues.fieldValue:
=Hi {{ $('If1').item.json.body.entry[0].changes[0].value.contacts[0].profile.name }},

We're glad you're interested in the Miles US Pathway. But we're sure you'll have
a lot of questions ü§î and also need to validate if you're eligible.

So, as a next step, *schedule a visit to the nearest Miles office* üè¢.

America wants *_YOU_*! üá∫üá∏

 CTA : Book Slot

conditions.rightValue: Hi, register me for the session!
This message was not delivered to maintain healthy ecosystem engagement.

parameters.query:
SELECT
  "public"."lead"."id" AS "id",
  "Lead Program"."programId" AS "Lead Program__programId",
  "Program - ProgramId"."full_form" AS "Program - ProgramId__full_form",
  "Phone"."phoneNumber" AS "Phone__phoneNumber"
FROM
  "public"."lead"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."lead_program" AS "Lead Program" ON "public"."lead"."id" = "Lead Program"."leadId"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."program" AS "Program - ProgramId" ON "Lead Program"."programId" = "Program - ProgramId"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."phone" AS "Phone" ON "public"."lead"."id" = "Phone"."leadId"
WHERE
  LOWER("Phone"."phoneNumber") = '{{ $('Webhook').first().json["body"]["entry"][0]["changes"][0]["value"]["contacts"][0]["wa_id"].slice(2) }}'
